channel.title: +1 Forward - BOB Series - Venture
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-bob-venture
Rach and Rich continue their Summer Series. This series covers games in the Belonging Outside Belonging (BOB) style of PbtA games. This second episode features Riley Rethal, creator of *Venture* .
Timecodes: 0:02:03 - Spend a Token... to hear Riley discuss Idle Dreaming 0:08:21 - You Also Play As The... person leaning about *Venture* 0:15:43 - No Dice, No Masters... a demo of *Venture* 's character creation and a setting element
Riley's Itch store can be found here: https://metagame.itch.io/
